metadata.title: CVE-2024-27830 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue isfixed in tvOS 17.5, visionOS 1.2, Safari 17.5, iOS 17.5 and iPadOS 17.5,watchOS 10.5, macOS Sonoma 14.5. A maliciously crafted webpage may be ableto fingerprint the user.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
